item.title: CVE-2024-34573|2024-06-04T17:42:51.160Z -- pootlepress -- pootle%20pagebuilder%20%E2%80%93%20wordpress%20page%20builder
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Pootlepress Pootle Pagebuilder – WordPress Page builder allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Pootle Pagebuilder – WordPress Page builder: from n/a through 5.7.1.
